articles.title: Tennessee nurse faints live on air minutes after getting Pfizer's COVID-19 vaccine - Daily Mail
articles.description: Tiffany Pontes Dover, a 30-year-old mother-of-two and nurse manager at CHI Memorial Hospital in Chattanooga, Tennessee, was among the first staff members there to receive the vaccine on Thursday.
articles.content:
If you're known to faint from pain or the sight of needles, perhaps volunteering to get the COVID-19 vaccine live on television isn't a wise choice. 
But one Tennessee nurse didn't let it stop her f… [+5520 chars]
